cn.title: 比特派服务器升级维护通知

message.data: 比特派服务器将于香港时间 2019年11月06日凌晨 00:30 停机维护，预计30-60分钟完成。升级期间将暂停收发币、币币交易等全部功能。请您提前做好相关规划，感谢您的理解与支持。

新浪微博：@比特派钱包 weibo.com/bitpiewallet
微信公众号：公众号搜索“bitpieteam”
Telegram：t.me/bitpie1

In order to provide you a better user experience, Bitpie will perform a system upgrade shortly after 2019-11-06 00:30 (HKT). The upgrade will take approximately 30-60 minutes. Bitpie Wallet will suspend such services as sends/receives and Coin Swap during this period.
